data.text: @canyonroad5281 @FacesOfCOVID People got the freedom to choose. No one either vaccinated or not has the fault for what has happened. Victims did not create this whole and tragic situation.
@canyonroad5281 @FacesOfCOVID Why is it ok to slander people who have lost their lives if this is the state of the world he’s the lucky one . Rest his soul.
@FacesOfCOVID I'm not following you. It showed up on my feed
@canyonroad5281 And you are entitled to your opinion, and to not follow if you find the work of @FacesOfCOVID objectionable.
@FacesOfCOVID Yes I'm aware of that and I don't see your impartiality as moral.
@canyonroad5281 We don’t assume or demand vaccination status from grieving families. If families provide it, it is always included.
@FacesOfCOVID Why is it ok to celebrate the lives of those who were unwilling to prevent themselves from acquiring the disease  and who knowingly put others lives in jeopardy
@FacesOfCOVID Condolences to his family. May his many memories provide comfort to this most difficult time.🙏🏽💜🕊️
